name: This is L., Inc.
description: Provider of personal care products for women intended to impact women's lives. The company's personal care products are organically made and provides a range of tampons, pads and condom prophylactics, providing women with an access to basic health products.
one_liner: Provider of personal care products for women intended to impact women's lives. The company's personal care products are organically made and provides a range of tampons, pads and condom prophylactics, providing women with an access to basic health products.
